mapper.select: select c.cou_code,i.INS_ID, COU_NAME, CONTENT, OPENDATE, BANNER_IMG, COU_PERIOD, SAMPLE_VIDEO, HITS, FINAL_APPROVE, i.ins_name, i.ins_profile,(crg.registrationdate+c.cou_period) courseperiod,completion_status, cc.enroll_rate, cc.exam_results, crg.registrationdate,progress_Rate ,(select count(*) from COURSE_REGISTRATION where cou_code = #{couCode} and COMPLETION_STATUS = 'Y') completeCnt from COURSES c, INSTRUCTOR i,course_registration crg, completion_criteria cc where c.ins_id = i.ins_id and c.cou_code = #{couCode} and crg.ui_id = #{uiId} and c.cou_code = crg.cou_code

select CN_CODE, i.INS_ID, CN_TITLE, CN_DATE, CN_CONTENT, INS_NAME,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CN_DATE) ind from COURSES_NOTICE cn, INSTRUCTOR i where cou_code = #{couCode} and i.ins_id = cn.ins_id order by ind desc

select lec.LEC_CODE, LEC_NAME, LEC_CONTENT, VIDEO_NAME, COURSE_STATUS from LECTURES lec, COURSE_RECORD cr where lec.cou_code = #{couCode} and lec.lec_code = cr.lec_code and cr.ui_id = #{uiId} order by lec.lec_Code desc
